data.name: ChartPage_Title
data.value: Get an overview of your repos

data.name: ChartPage_Body_ShowAllTraffic
data.value: Charts show all traffic related to your repo:

data.name: ChartPage_Body_ZoomInOut
data.value: Zoom in/out to see accurately what you need to know

data.name: ChartPage_Body_LongPress
data.value: Long press on the chart to see precise numeric values

data.name: ConnectToGitHubPage_Body_GetStarted
data.value: Get started by connecting your GitHub account, or try demo mode to tour GitTrends!

data.name: GitTrendsPage_Body_GitTrendsHelps
data.value: GitTrends helps monitor your GitHub repos:

data.name: GitTrendsPage_Body_MonitorGitHubRepos
data.value: Monitor GitHub Repo Views, Clones, Forks, Stars and Issues

data.name: NotificationsPage_Title
data.value: Be notified when repos are trending

data.name: NotificationsPage_Body_MoreTrafficThanUsual
data.value: GitTrends will notify you when your GitHub repositories are receiving more traffic than usual.
